participant_1.name: Lily
participant_1.personality: Creative and nostalgic, Lily often finds comfort in her hobbies and values her childhood memories.
participant_1.background: My Nintendo 64 is probably my most valued possession because it was my first console and it has a lot of sentimental value to me. I have freckles all over my face. I am a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. My father is a mechanic. My dolls help me cope with the stress of my job.

participant_2.name: Tom
participant_2.personality: Easygoing and nature-loving, Tom enjoys spending time outdoors and finds solace in gardening. He is adapting to new changes in his life.
participant_2.background: I don't have a lot of time to exercise because I work long hours at the museum, but I try to get out for a walk every day. I work in a doctor's office. I love nature and my rose garden is one of my favorite places to be. I am recently divorced. I enjoy the feeling of new sneakers on my feet.

content.text: Hi there! I'm a recent college graduate looking for a job in marketing. What do you do for a living?
Hi! I work in a doctor's office. I recently got divorced, so I'm trying to find a new hobby to keep me busy. Do you have any hobbies?
I like to play video games and collect old dolls. I also like to go to the rose garden in my neighborhood.
Oh, I love going to the rose garden in my neighborhood too! I love the smell of the flowers.
I know, right? It's so relaxing.
I'm glad we have something in common.
I'm going to go for a walk in the rose garden now. Do you want to come with me?
